decision_conditions: The proposed annex, by virtue of its internal layout, provision of a separate front door, and lack of internal access to the main dwelling would comprise a self-contained residential unit, and would fail to be satisfactorily ancillary to the main dwelling, providing substandard quality of accommodation by failing to meet the minimum room and unit sizes, contrary to paragraph 135 of the NPPF (2023), policies D3, D4 and D6 of the London Plan (2021), policy 7B of the Ealing Development Management DPD (2013), Ealing Housing Design Guide (2022) Ealing's draft Local Plan (2024), and the Technical Housing Standards.
description: Conversion of existing garage into habitable space to be used as a home office (ancillary to main building) including associated external alteration involving the insertion of windows in lieu of the garage door opening and a door to the side elevation
